Orchid¶

Potential interfaces¶

  • Logic analyzer using this cable (already implemented in Foxglove)
  • UART with ‘standard’ pin order
  • SPI
  • I2C
  • JTAG
  • AVR ISP
  • PMOD
  • SAO
